note:
A German found her true home in Ireland, now lives at her dream place in this wonderful white house and shares her home with B&B guests.
Anam Sona means Happy Soul. Spend a holiday at this place on the #BearaPeninsula in #Ireland and let your soul be happy. https://anamsona.eu

I'm your hostess and I like to share all the gorgeous places and locations with you. #Photography is my favourite hobby. Every day looks different and offers different opportunities, every season has its own colours and beauty. This is my way to share the beauty of Irish #nature, #landscapes and #Flowers. You will also see pictures of my little dogs sometimes ;-)

I already have a Mastodon account at @anamsona@fimidi.com but want to explore Calckey and perhaps migrate my account to Calckey later.

It was time to move. I'm now in Calckey. I'll hope, all my followers are with me again‚ù£
